frontpage.title: Translation demo
frontpage.frontpage_introText1: Join and help us survey Norwegian nature!
frontpage.frontpage_introText2: Learn more about how you can contribute
frontpage.frontpage_introText3: Want to help us ensure the quality of our sightings' data?

shared.tableCaption_validatedData: Number of quality assured observations per species group
shared.tableCaption_validatedDataOriginal: Number of taxa observed and number of observations per species group
shared.tableCaption_redlistedSpeciesData: Number of sightings of endangered species by species group
shared.tableCaption_alienSpeciesData: Number of sightings of alien species by species group
shared.tableHeading_qualityCheckedAndApproved: Quality checked and approved by validator**

redlist.tableDescription_content: The table shows number of observations of endagered species by species group of the following categories:
redlist.tableDescription_includedData: Endangered-species categories containing no observations are omitted from the table. An overview on which numbers are included can be found at [xxxxx]. Numbers are updated daily.
redlist.tableDescription_excluded: * Includes all validation categories except 'not validated (sighting not validated).'
redlist.tableDescription_approved: ** Has one of the following validation categorie:
